moves.1. e4 e5 2. f4: King's gambit. One of the most hazardous openings. One bad move and you are finished!
moves.2... exf4 3. Nf3 Nf6 4. d3 g5: Greed! Wants to save a pawn?
moves.5. Nxg5 Bh6 6. Bxf4: Ooops! One pawn in the hand gets two in the bush.
moves.6... Rg8 7. h4 d6 8. Nc3 Qe7 9. Qd2 Nc6: I want a bishop! (And maybe a queen)
moves.11. Be2 Nxf4 12. Qxf4 f6: Now's white is in trouble but wait a minute...
moves.13. Nd5: Oh no! The magic knight appears.
moves.13... Bxg5 14. hxg5 Nd4: OK. I've got a knight too.
moves.15. Bh5+: The holy bishop makes a call!
moves.15... Kd8 16. Nxe7: Finito! One of my best games in knight gambit. Next I will comment one of many losses in this variant.
